data.title: 82 Divine Baby Names That Mean Dream
data.meta_description: Names that mean dream hit the sweet spot between enchanting, other-worldly, aspiring, and optimistic. Read on for our favorites.
data.text:

Why choose a baby name that means dream?

When we dream, our brains process information, help us learn things more quickly, and fuel our creativity.

In cultures throughout the world, dreams are potent omens that either predict the future or connect us to the past.

Dreams have been thought to express our unconscious desires and can even be a source of anxiety for some.

So while we can agree that dreams are certainly powerful, the research about exactly what they are and mean is forever ongoing.

And our nightly adventures are not the only thing weâ€™re talking about when we talk about dreams.

Weâ€™re also speaking about our hopes and aspirations.

As a mama-to-be, youâ€™ve probably begun to dream about what your life will look like when your child is born, what they will grow up to be, and how your own life will change.

Names meaning dream capture this perfect combination of hopefulness, optimism, and wisdom.

Girl names that mean dream

Weâ€™ll kick off with girlsâ€™ names that either mean â€œdreamâ€ or are closely related.

Ahlam: With Arabic origins, this sweet baby girlâ€™s name means â€œshe with the beauty of dreams.â€

From Sanskrit roots, MÄyÄ means â€œillusion or magic.â€ It also has Greek origins, where it means â€œgood mother.â€ And from the MÄori language, it means â€œcourageâ€ or â€œbravery.â€ Now thatâ€™s one mighty little dream name!

What girl name means dreamer?

And then here are some of our other favorites that are perfect for a little castle-builder.

Alviva: Meaning â€œdreamer,â€ the name has English origins. It also has another adorable meaning â€” â€œelf friendâ€.

Boy names that mean dream

Now for our top picks for baby boy names that mean dream:

After something that works for boys, girls, and they-bies? Weâ€™ve got you covered with these unisex dream baby names:

Albadawi: Meaning â€œinner dreamâ€ in Arabic.
